title: Radiant Philosophy: From Research to Deployable Systems
author: Radiant Group
excerpt: Why Radiant focuses on deployable, grounded, and evaluable AI systems.
content:
## Context
Research prototypes rarely survive deployment.

## Philosophy
Correctness without usability is failure.

## Principles
- Systems over models
- Evaluation over intuition
- Transparency over opacity

## Practice
Every Radiant project is designed for deployment from day one.

## Lessons Learned
Engineering discipline enables trustworthy AI.

## Conclusion
Radiant exists where research meets reality.
